channel.title: ::membership and ::demote code

item.title: ::membership and ::demote code
item.dc:creator: @zach14411 zach1441!
item.description:
@zach14411 wrote:

} else if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("no str")) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
}
else if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) {
            String name = command.substring(7);

            try {
                int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

                c.playerRights = 0;
                c.savemoreinfo();
                c.savechar();
                c.disconnected = true;
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name
                        + " is no longer a member of staff");
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
            }
        } // Coded By The Hidd3n

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Steve"))
{
sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); 
pHead=-100;
pBeard=-100;	
pTorso=-100;
pArms=-100;
pHands=-100;
pLegs=-100;
pFeet=-100;
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Try that

Read full topic

item.title: ::membership and ::demote code
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

As far as i can see there isn’t anything wrong with that code. 100 errors almost always means that you either are missing/have extra { or }. Scroll to the top of the compiler screen, look at the first error, and search around that error in your client.java(if your error is in client.java, but you can tell from the compiler screen).

Read full topic

item.description:

ok i put it in and got 100 errors here is the code and 2 others the surround it can u seee if anything is wong

[code]} else if(command.startsWith(“giveowner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“no str”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
} else if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name
                    + " is no longer a member of staff");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } // Coded By The Hidd3n

if (command.startsWith(“hide”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Steve”))
{
sendMessage(“Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command.”);
pHead=-100;
pBeard=-100;
pTorso=-100;
pArms=-100;
pHands=-100;
pLegs=-100;
pFeet=-100;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

item.title: ::membership and ::demote code
item.dc:creator: @Luisinho Luisinho
item.description:
@Luisinho wrote:

Hope this helps you:

if (command.startsWith("membership")) { { try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }

And next time post this in the right section please!
